long_description: Available in 7 sizes, the C.A.M.P. USA Pro Nut stoppers feature a half-moon shape for secure placements in cracks from 7mm wide to 33mm wide. Nuts utilize a half-moon shape for accurate, secure placements. Grooves on the convex sides of the nuts are designed to ease extraction. Anodized colors help you quickly identify which nut you need.
short_description: Available in 7 sizes, the C.A.M.P. USA Pro Nut stoppers feature a half-moon shape for secure placements in cracks from 7mm wide to 33mm wide.
